column2: SPR Scanned Maps, Pejabat Suruhanjaya Pilihan Raya Pulau Pinang

This is not the official dataset of SPR. The boundaries of Daerah Mengundi on reclaimed land (Tanjung Pinang) could not be verified). While every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy and the currency of the dataset, there are no guarantees, expressed or implied or fitness for a particular purpose, accompanying this product. The map should be used for general reference purposes only.The publisher (through Sinar Project) welcomes any corrections or feedback for the dataset being utilized.
